00001 #include "FittedRmaxq.hh"

00003 namespace {
00007   const double explorationthreshold = 2.0;
00008 
00010   const double maxval = 0.0;
00011 
00014   const double discountfactor = 1.0;
00015 
00019   const double epsilon = 0.01;
00020 
00025   const double modelbreadth = 0.04;
00026 
00031   const int resolutionfactor = 4;
00032 
00038   const double minweight = 0.01;
00039 
00043   const double minfraction = 0.01;
00044 
00045   StatePredicateRef truep = TrueStatePredicate::create();
00046   StatePredicateRef falsep = FalseStatePredicate::create();
00047   StateFunctionRef zerof = ZeroStateFunction::create();
00048 
00049   StateVariables dimensions;
00050 } // end of anonymous namespace
00051 
00052 TaskRef get_task_hierarchy(taskspec_t *ts)
00053 {
00054   assert(getNumIntObs(ts) == 0);
00055   // Number of state variables
00056   const unsigned dim = getNumDoubleObs(ts);
00057 
00058   // First four actions are navigational.  Fifth is used to terminate
00059   // an episode.  Remaining actions activate subgoals.
00060   int firstaction = getIntActMin(ts, 0);
00061   int lastaction = getIntActMax(ts, 0);
00062   int num_actions = lastaction - firstaction + 1;
00063   int numgoals = num_actions - 4 - 1; // Four movement actions, one end-of-task
00064 
00065   std::vector<TaskRef> root_children;
00066 
00067   // Create four navigational actions.
00068   dimensions.clear();
00069   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
00070     dimensions[i] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i));
00071 
00072   // Depend only on first two state variables: x-y coordinates.
00073   static const char *udrl[] = { "up", "down", "right", "left" };
00074   for (int i = firstaction; i < firstaction + 4; ++i) {
00075     DynamicAveragerRef model_averager =
00076       KernelAverager::create(modelbreadth, minweight, minfraction, dimensions);
00077     TaskRef task =
00078       PrimitiveTask::create(udrl[i - firstaction], i, explorationthreshold,
00079                             maxval, model_averager, truep);
00080     root_children.push_back(task);
00081   }
00082 
00083   // Fifth action only available if all subgoals have been achieved,
00084   // and its behavior otherwise does not depend on the current state.
00085   std::map<unsigned,double> goalcondition;
00086   for (unsigned i = 2; i < dim; ++i)
00087     goalcondition[i] = 1.0;
00088   StatePredicateRef all_goals =
00089     GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00090   DynamicAveragerRef model_averager =
00091     KernelAverager::create(modelbreadth, minweight, minfraction,
00092                            StateVariables());
00093   TaskRef final_action =
00094     PrimitiveTask::create("finish", firstaction + 4, explorationthreshold, maxval,
00095                           model_averager, all_goals);
00096   root_children.push_back(final_action);
00097 
00098   // Subgoal attainment actions depend on three state variables: the
00099   // x-y coordinates and the corresponding goal attainment flag.
00100   // These actions should only be available when the corresponding
00101   // flag is not yet set.
00102   for (int i = 0; i < numgoals; ++i) {
00103     goalcondition.clear();
00104     goalcondition[i + 2] = 0.0;
00105     StatePredicateRef precond =
00106       GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00107     goalcondition[i + 2] = 1.0;
00108     StatePredicateRef postcond =
00109       GoalStatePredicate::create(goalcondition.begin(), goalcondition.end());
00110     dimensions[i+2] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i+2) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i+2));
00111     DynamicAveragerRef model_averager =
00112       KernelAverager::create(modelbreadth, minweight, minfraction, dimensions);
00113     std::string name = "pickup";
00114     name.append(1, 'A' + i);
00115     TaskRef subgoal_primitive =
00116       PrimitiveTask::create(name, i + firstaction + 5, explorationthreshold,
00117                             maxval, model_averager, precond);
00118     root_children.push_back(subgoal_primitive);
00119 
00120     dimensions.erase(i+2);
00121   }
00122 
00123   // Finally, create root task with full state variable representation.
00124   for (unsigned i = 2; i < dim; ++i)
00125     dimensions[i] = 1.0 / (getDoubleObsMax(ts, i) - getDoubleObsMin(ts, i));
00126   AveragerRef value_averager =
00127     InterpolationAverager::create(resolutionfactor, dimensions);
00128   return CompositeTask::create("ROOT",
00129                                root_children.begin(),
00130                                root_children.end(),
00131                                truep,
00132                                falsep,
00133                                zerof,
00134                                value_averager,
00135                                discountfactor,
00136                                epsilon);
00137 }
